name: RailsSupport
text:
This page no longer contains statistics on Rails support in JRuby. Instead, visit our continuous integration server at the following URLs to see the current test results for each of the core Rails projects.

* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIONMAILER-DEF/latest ActionMailer]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIONPACK-DEF/latest ActionPack]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIVESUPPORT-DEF/latest ActiveSupport]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIVERECORD-DERBYTRUNK/latest ActiveRecord with AR-JDBC trunk on Derby]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIVERECORD-MYSQLTRUNK/latest ActiveRecord with AR-JDBC trunk on MySQL]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ACTIVERECORD-MYSQLTRUNK/latest ActiveRecord with AR-JDBC current release on MySQL]
* [http://jruby.thresher.com/browse/ARJDBC-TRUNK/latest ActiveRecord-JDBC]

For information on running a JRuby on Rails system, see
[http://www.headius.com/jrubywiki/index.php/JRuby_on_Rails JRuby on Rails].
